Class
Description
DoaAnimation
Objects of this class are responsible for providing support for sprite based animations.
DoaAnimations
Responsible for providing a Factory to create Animations for DoaEngine to display.
DoaArbitraryShapeCollider
A collider of arbitrary convex shape.
DoaArbitraryShapeRenderer
Arbitrary shape renderer.
DoaArrowKeysControl
A simple arrow keys controller.
DoaBodyType
Physics body types.
DoaBoxCollider
A collider shaped as a rectangle.
DoaCamera
Represents a camera construct that looks at a certain point in 2D space, this point can be animate.
DoaCircleCollider
A collider shaped as a circle.
DoaClient
A barebones wrapper for Socket and it's desired functionality.
DoaCollider
Blueprint of a physics collider.

DoaDebugTransform
Debug script.
DoaDiscordActivity

DoaDiscordService
Please see Discord API documentation for more info.
DoaEllipseCollider
An approximate ellipse collider.
DoaEngine
Responsible for creating and supplying the graphics context used for drawing all created DoaObjects, and updating all created DoaObjects.
DoaEngineSettings
An object of this class is supplied as an argument to DoaGame.initialize(DoaEngineSettings, DoaWindowSettings, String...).
DoaEssentialComponent
DoaComponents implementing this interface cannot be removed from a DoaObject once they are added.
DoaFonts
Responsible for providing a Factory to create Fonts for DoaEngine to use.
DoaGame
 
DoaGraphicsFunctions
Responsible for wrapping the Graphics2D class Sun Microsystems provides.
DoaKeyboard
Responsible for catching all fired keyboard inputs at any logical frame.
DoaLights
Responsible for providing a tool to create and set scene lights for DoaEngine.
DoaLogger
Implementation of Logger.
DoaMath
Math utilities.
DoaMouse
Responsible for catching all fired mouse inputs at any logical frame.
DoaMouseAdapter
A simple mouse control.
DoaNetPacket<T extends Serializable>
Use objects of this class to encapsulate data that will be transmitted through the objects of DoaClient and DoaServer.
DoaObject
Blueprint of all objects that are going to be processed by DoaEngine, all objects that will be processed by DoaEngine must either be this class, or its sub-classes.
DoaObjectBuilder<T extends DoaObject>
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
This class and all of its functionality has been deprecated and will be removed at some future date.
DoaObjectInstantiationException
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
This exception and all of its functionality has been deprecated and will be removed at some future date.
DoaPhysics
Physics engine.
DoaRectRenderer

DoaRenderer
Renderer blueprint.
DoaRenderingMode
Specifies the rendering mode of DoaEngine.
DoaRigidBody
A body of simulated physics.
DoaScene
Responsible for keeping DoaObjects.
DoaSceneHandler
Class is for loading-unloading scenes to DoaEngine.
DoaScript
Script contract.
DoaServer
Standard issue socket server.
DoaSoundClip
Easy use version of Clip.
DoaSounds
Responsible for providing a Factory to create DoaAudioClips for DoaEngine to play.
DoaSpriteRenderer
Sprite renderer.
DoaSprites
Responsible for providing a Factory to create sprites for DoaEngine to display.
DoaTasker
Abstracts threading and all it's related functionality from the common DoaEngine user.
DoaTaskGuard
Wrapper for AtomicBoolean.
DoaTransform
Transform component.
DoaUtils
Useful functions to shorten AND/OR simply code.
DoaVector
2D float vector.
DoaWASDControl
A simple WASD keys controller.
DoaWindow
Responsible for being the window for the game.
DoaWindowSettings
An object of this class is supplied as an argument to DoaGame.initialize(DoaEngineSettings, DoaWindowSettings, String...).
